title: Help ID'ing this typeface
content:
It’s got a really identifiable “A”, but I can’t seem to find the name for it. Thanks preemptively for the help!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091215143650im_/http:/typophile.com/files/specificA_5074.jpg)
author: existentialpogo

comments.content:
I think Berthold offers a version of Algerian without the shadow.

- Lex
Huh? I don’t see a shadow in the Linotype version I linked to. Am I blind?

Sorry - I never checked the link :-) I remember that once upon a time the unshadowed version was a rarity. Assumed it still was :-)

- Lex

<cite>Sorry - I never checked the link :-)</cite>

Neither did I. Apologies! The credit is all yours.
No worries guys. Just glad I’m not deluded (or blind) ;)
